tool.name: Skyline
tool.description: Skyline intensity based quantitation via the SkylineRunner interface!
tool.command:
#if $resLabel.residueIsotopes=="--residueIsotopes" #set $heavy_modstr = str($resLabel.heavymod).replace("___,","___") #set $light_modstr = str($resLabel.lightmod).replace("___,","___") #end if
awk "{ if (\$0 !~ />/) {print toupper(\$0)} else {print \$0} }" ${database} > ${database}_corrected.fasta & #if not $protdb_upload.protdb #set $background_database = $str($protdb_upload.background_database)
awk "{ if (\$0 !~ />/) {print toupper(\$0)} else {print \$0} }" ${background_database} > ${background_database}_corrected.fasta & #end if python2.7 ${__tool_directory__}/skyline_wrapper.py --sslgz ${ssl_and_mzml} ${fractions} --db ${database}_corrected.fasta $add_mods --mode ${ms_level.quant_type} #if $ms_level.quant_type=="dda_ms1" --ms1_res ${ms_level.ms1_resolution} --ms1_res_mz ${ms_level.ms1_res_mz} #else if $ms_level.quant_type=="ms2_prm" --ms2_res ${ms_level.ms2_resolution} --ms2_res_mz ${ms_level.ms2_res_mz} #else if $ms_level.quant_type=="dia" --ms1_res ${ms_level.ms1_resolution_dia} --ms1_res_mz ${ms_level.ms1_res_mz_dia} --ms2_res ${ms_level.ms2_resolution_dia} --ms2_res_mz ${ms_level.ms2_res_mz_dia} --skyline_file ${ms_level.skyline_file_dia} #else if $ms_level.quant_type=="provided_file" --skyline_file ${ms_level.skyline_file} #end if --rt_tolerance $rt_tolerance $add_mods #if $msstats --msstats $output_msstats #end if $mprophet #if $protdb_upload.protdb #set $protdb_file = $str($protdb_upload.protdb_file) --protdb $protdb_file #else #set $enzyme = $str($protdb_upload.enzyme) #set $missedcleave = $str($protdb_upload.missedcleave) --background_db ${background_database}_corrected.fasta --enzyme $enzyme --missedcleave $missedcleave $protdb_upload.raggedEnds --peptide_uniqueness $peptide_uniqueness #end if --exp_file $exp_file $makeblib #if $resLabel.residueIsotopes=="--residueIsotopes" --residueIsotopes --heavyMass "${heavy_modstr}" --lightMass "${light_modstr}" $resLabel.removeUnmodRI --isotopeScriptLocation /galaxy-central/tools/wohl-proteomics/wohl_skyline/isotope_pair_generator.py #end if --output $output --chromatograms_file $output_chromatograms --peak_boundaries $output_boundaries --num_procs $num_procs ; sleep 5

param.name: ssl_and_mzml
param.label: SSL tar.gz file with data included

param.name: makeblib
param.label: Make new BLIB files?
param.help: Please use SSL converter when doing PTM localization studies! This will include type2 PSMs!

param.name: quant_type
param.label: Choose quantitation type
param.help: ONLY DOC UPLOAD IS CURRENTLY SUPPORTED. Skyline Document Upload, DDA-MS1, t-MS2 (PRM), DIA MS1+2 msx

param.name: rt_tolerance
param.label: RT window for chromatogram extraction (+/- min)

param.name: enzyme
param.label: Choose Proteolytic Enzyme
param.help: You should match this to the document you uploaded...

param.name: raggedEnds
param.label: Exclude peptides with potential ragged ends?
param.help: Removes peptides which abut multiple cleavage sites like ...KR or KK... etc etc.

param.name: mprophet
param.label: Use mProphet model?
param.help: How to build the mProphet model?

param.name: removeUnmodRI
param.label: Remove Unmodified peptides?
param.help: This must be enabled for the mProphet model to properly build using isotope information.

tool.help: This was coded for use with Skyline-Daily v3.6.1.10690 and NEWER releases.
